sentences.en: A sizeable proportion of the particles strike the wall during the traverse of the tube.
sentences.cn: 有相当大部分的粒子在通过管子期间与管壁相碰撞.

sentences.en: By and large the limbed tetrapods and near-tetrapods unearthed thus far have been sizeable beasts around a meter long.
sentences.cn: 整体说来，目前发掘出的有肢四足动物或近四足动物，都是相当大的怪兽，体长约有一公尺。

sentences.en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentences.cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

sentences.en: Out in front, Clarke had built up such a sizeable safety margin that he eased the pace and started cruising.
sentences.cn: 克拉克远远地开在前面，已保持了一段足够长的安全车距，他于是放慢车速，开始定速巡航。

sentences.en: Part - time students make up a sizeable proportion of the college population.
sentences.cn: 在大学入学生中,半工半读的学生占了相当大的比例.

sentences.en: Rich experience in building, motivating, managing and leading a sizeable complicated team.
sentences.cn: 具有丰富的建设 、 激励 、 管理和带领相当规模团队的经验.

sentences.en: Shippers with sizeable volume on hand can choose to use whichever line they like.
sentences.cn: 货量大的货主可以任意挑选他们所喜欢用的船公司.

sentences.en: So far, the optimists form a sizeable majority.
sentences.cn: 至今, 这些乐观者都占相当多数.

sentences.en: That gives the unions sizeable power as kingmakers.
sentences.cn: 这让工会近似政界实力人物,大权在握.

sentences.en: That would have amounted to a sizeable subsidy to badly managed institutions.
sentences.cn: 但为了鼓励它们采取这样做,英国央行收取的利率也要比惩罚性利率低.

sentences.en: The delegation from China seems to be quite a sizeable one.
sentences.cn: 张樟只是在关键的时候伸头进来唱了一句就引起了全场轰动,就这样一曲成名了.

sentences.en: The town has a sizeable Sikh population.
sentences.cn: 城里有为数众多的锡克教教徒。

sentences.en: There is only one other sizeable Chinese paper company.
sentences.cn: 在中国,规模较大的纸业公司只有另外一家.

sentences.en: These small contributions soon count up to a sizeable amount.
sentences.cn: 这些捐款很快就集少成多,总数相当可观.

sentences.en: Zurich's affluence came initially from cornering a sizeable chunk of the 14th Century silk trade.
sentences.cn: 苏黎世的富足最初来自于14世纪对丝绸贸易的高度垄断。

words.tran_cn: 相比（size的过去分词）；按大小分类
